categories.label: Needle Upgrades
categories.desc: Upgrades to Hornet's primary weapon, the Needle.

items.label: Base Needle
items.description: Long sewing tool, uniquely balanced for combat. The blade is marked by time and use.

items.label: Sharpened Needle
items.description: The blade is honed to a fine edge.
items.obtain: The Needle can be upgraded by Pinmaster Plinney

items.label: Shining Needle
items.description: The blade gleams sharper than ever before.
items.obtain: The Needle can be upgraded by Pinmaster Plinney

items.label: Hivesteel Needle
items.description: The highly refined blade reveals its hivesteel banding.
items.obtain: The Needle can be upgraded by Pinmaster Plinney

items.label: Pale Steel Needle
items.description: The Hivesteel blade has been sharpened to its ultimate form.
items.obtain: The Needle can be upgraded by Pinmaster Plinney

categories.label: Mask Shards
categories.desc: Fragments that increase Hornet's maximum health when collected.

items.label: Mask Shard #1
items.description: Can be bought from Pebb for 300 rosaries, If the mask shard is not bought from Pebb before Act 3 begins, the shard will be moved to Grindle's shop in Blasted Steps for 320 rosaries

items.label: Mask Shard #2
items.description: Lower Wormways accessed through Mosshome, Behind a breakable wall, just in front of the door requiring a Simple Key

items.label: Mask Shard #3
items.description: A passageway between the Marrow and Deep Docks, Accessed from The Marrow. Cling Grip recommended

items.label: Mask Shard #4
items.description: Area above Seamstress's home in Far Fields, Requires Drifter's Cloak

items.label: Mask Shard #5
items.description: Centre of Shellwood, At the end of a platforming challenge behind a breakable wall

items.label: Mask Shard #6
items.description: East Weavenest Atla, Requires Cling Grip. Behind breakable wall

items.label: Mask Shard #7
items.description: Sold by Jubilana in Songclave for  750 rosaries, Complete the The Wandering Merchant Wish

items.label: Mask Shard #8
items.description: West Cogwork Core past enemy gauntlet, Accessible after defeating the Cogwork Dancers

items.label: Mask Shard #9

items.label: Mask Shard #10
items.description: Reward for completing the Savage Beastfly Wish, Defeat Fourth Chorus and Savage Beastfly in Hunter's March, enter Songclave

items.label: Mask Shard #11
items.description: Inside bone building in east Far Fields, Requires Clawline and Drifter's Cloak

items.label: Mask Shard #12
items.description: Southwest Mount Fay, west of the bench, Requires Faydown Cloak

items.label: Mask Shard #13
items.description: Northeast part of the Slab, Requires Key of Apostate and Faydown Cloak. Challenge can be skipped with Silk Soar

items.label: Mask Shard #14
items.description: East Bilewater, in a hallway filled with Slubberlugs

items.label: Mask Shard #15
items.description: East Wisp Thicket, Requires Faydown Cloak.

items.label: Mask Shard #16
items.description: West Blasted Steps, Requires Clawline and Faydown Cloak. Challenge can be skipped with Silk Soar

items.label: Mask Shard #17
items.description: Brightvein Requires Silk Soar

items.label: Mask Shard #18
items.description: East Far Fields, Reward from the Sprintmaster Fastest in Pharloom wish

items.label: Mask Shard #19
items.description: Bellhart Wishwall, Reward from Dark Hearts wish

items.label: Mask Shard #20
items.description: Bellhart Wishwall, Reward from The Hidden Hunter wish

categories.label: Silk Hearts
categories.desc: Boss memories that upgrade Hornet's Silk regeneration.

items.label: Silk Heart #1
items.description: Defeating the Bell Beast in The Marrow area.

items.label: Silk Heart #2
items.description: Defeating the Unravelled in The Whiteward.

items.label: Silk Heart #3
items.description: Defeating Lace in Act Two.

categories.label: Miscellaneous
categories.desc: Special unique unlocks and hidden upgrades.

items.label: Everbloom
items.description: Return to the Snail Shamans and complete the memory sequence.

items.label: Bind Eva
items.description: Unlock by binding 6 Crests and using 15 Memory Lockets.

categories.label: Crests
categories.desc: Crests are equipment that allows Hornet to change her moveset.

items.label: Hunter Crest
items.description: Stalk prey and attack with lethal strikes.

items.label: Reaper Crest
items.description: Attack with heavy, arcing slashes and reap additional Silk from enemies.

items.label: Wanderer Crest
items.description: Cut swiftly and nimbly with short, precise strikes.

items.label: Beast Crest
items.description: Tear foes with savage slashes. Bind to enter a wild fury and steal life from prey.

items.label: Witch Crest
items.description: Whip the needle in sweeping swings. Leech the life of foes through twisted roots.

items.label: Architect Crest
items.description: Spin the needle as a screw, shredding foes. Spend Silk to rapidly craft new tools from shell shards.

items.label: Shaman Crest
items.description: Cast the blade forward to empower Silk Skills with powerful runes.

categories.label: Silk Skills
categories.desc: Special combat techniques unlocked through Silk.

items.label: Silkspear
items.description: Deadly Weaver technique. Throw the needle forward with force amplified by coiled Silk.

items.label: Thread Storm
items.description: Deadly Weaver technique. Cast the needle in a whirl of Silk around oneself, lashing foes.

items.label: Cross Stitch
items.description: Deflective technique of a creature spun from thread. Bind Silk around the needle to deflect enemy attacks and instantly strike back.

items.label: Sharpdart
items.description: Deadly Weaver technique. Pierce through enemies in a blur of blade and Silk.

items.label: Rune Rage
items.description: Forgotten Weaver technique. Sew rending runes upon one's enemies.

items.label: Pale Nails
items.description: Technique taken from the primal source of Silk. Spin talons from thread that seek out enemies.

categories.label: Tool Pouch Upgrades
categories.desc: Capacity upgrades for Hornet's tool pouch.

items.label: Base Tool Pouch #0
items.description: Base tool pouch with minimal capacity.

items.label: Expanded Tool Pouch #1
items.description: Bought from Mort in Far Fields for 220 Rosaries (Act 1/2) or from Grindle in Blasted Steps (Act 3).

items.label: Large Tool Pouch #2
items.description: Reward from Loddie in The Marrow for beating his first challenge (Act 1/2) / Found in Loddie's former location (Act 3).

items.label: Huge Tool Pouch #3
items.description: Reward for completing Nuu's Wish: Bugs of Pharloom.

items.label: Max Tool Pouch #4
items.description: Reward from Mooshka after helping the Flea Caravan move to Putrified Ducts.

categories.label: Crafting Kit Upgrades
categories.desc: Capacity upgrades for Hornet's crafting kit.

items.label: Base Crafting Kit #0
items.description: Base crafting kit.

items.label: Expanded Crafting Kit #1
items.description: Bought from Forge Daughter in Deep Docks for 180 Rosaries.

items.label: Large Crafting Kit #2
items.description: Reward for completing the Crawbug Clearing Wish.

items.label: Huge Crafting Kit #3
items.description: Bought from Twelfth Architect in Underworks for 450 Rosaries.

items.label: Max Crafting Kit #4
items.description: Bought from Grindle in Blasted Steps for 700 Rosaries.

categories.label: Abilities
categories.desc: Core abilities that grant Hornet new movement and combat options.

items.label: Swift Step
items.description: Fabled Weaver talent. Dash forward and sprint with unnatural speed, as though gliding upon Silk.

items.label: Cling Grip
items.description: Ancient Weaver technique. Cling to sheer surfaces and leap off to rapidly scale heights.

items.label: Needolin
items.description: Holy Weaver talent. Play ancient melodies by stringing Silk along the needle.

items.label: Clawline
items.description: Advanced Weaver talent. Throw the Silk-strung needle like a harpoon and charge towards it.

items.label: Silk Soar
items.description: Ancient Weaver talent. Throw the needle upward and launch to tremendous heights.

items.label: Needle Strike
items.description: Charge power in the needle, then release as a deadly attack.

categories.label: Red Tools
categories.desc: Limited use consumable tools that require Shell Shards to be replenished at Benches.

items.label: Straight Pin
items.description: Located in The Marrow inside of Grindle's cell.

items.label: Threefold Pin
items.description: Located in Greymoor at Craw Lake. The tool is in a small room at the top right of the cavern, guarded by a Tallcraw.

items.label: Sting Shard
items.description: Purchased from Forge Daughter in Deep Docks for  140 Rosaries and 1 Craftmetal.

items.label: Tacks
items.description: Reward for completing the Roach Guts Wish

items.label: Throwing Ring
items.description: Reward for completing the Trail's End Wish.

items.label: Longpin
items.description: Located in Shellwood above the main entrance to Bellhart, blocked by a Wood Wasp nest.

items.label: Curveclaw
items.description: Purchased from Mottled Skarr in Hunter's March for  140 Rosaries. Alternatively, if Mottled Skarr is dead it can be found locked behind a gauntlet north of his original location.

items.label: Curvesickle
items.description: Obtained by giving the Curveclaw to a Mottled Skarr Scout in Act 3, in the target practice room above the Far Fields Bellway station.

items.label: Pimpillo
items.description: Crafted in a hidden room in northwest Greymoor for 1 CraftMetal

items.label: Silkshot (Architect)
items.description: Obtained by repairing the Ruined Tool found in Weavenest Murglin. Repairing at Twelfth Architect for 140 Rosaries and 1 CraftMetal provides this variant.

items.label: Silkshot (Forge)
items.description: Obtained by repairing the Ruined Tool found in Weavenest Murglin. Repairing at Forge Daughter for 240 Rosaries and 1 CraftMetal provides this variant.

items.label: Silkshot (Weaver)
items.description: Obtained by repairing the Ruined Tool found in Weavenest Murglin. Repairing at a room near the peak of Mount Fay for 1 CraftMetal provides this variant.

items.label: Conchcutter
items.description: Found inside the Coral Tower in Sands of Karak.

items.label: Delver's Drill
items.description: Found on a crafting table in the southwest of the Underworks.

items.label: Cogwork Wheel
items.description: Purchased at Twelfth Architect for 360 rosaries and 1 CraftMetal.

items.label: Voltvessels
items.description: Found behind a hidden wall in the northeast of Memorium.

items.label: CogFly
items.description: Crafted in a room in High Halls for 1 CraftMetal.

items.label: Rosary Cannon
items.description: Found behind a locked door in High Halls east of the sub-area The Forum.

items.label: Flintslate
items.description: Found in Deep Docks, beyond the Simple Key door.

items.label: Plasmium Phial
items.description: Reward for completing the Alchemist's Assistant Wish.

items.label: Flea Brew
items.description: Obtained from the Flea Caravan after completing the The Lost Fleas Wish.

items.description: Reward for completing the Berry Picking Wish.

items.label: Magma Bell
items.description: Purchased from Forge Daughter for 110 rosaries and 1 CraftMetal.

items.description: Found on a body in Far Fields.

items.label: Pollip Pouch
items.description: Reward for completing the Rite of the Pollip Wish

items.description: Purchased from Mottled Skarr for 260 rosaries. Can also be found next to his body if he died before it was purchased.

items.label: Multibinder
items.description: Purchased from Frey for 880 rosaries after completing the My Missing Courier Wish.

items.label: Weavelight
items.description: Found in Weavenest Atla after defeating a pair of Moss Mothers.

items.label: Sawtooth Circlet
items.description: Purchased from Twelfth Architect for 230 rosaries and 1 CraftMetal.

items.label: Injector Band
items.description: Found in Whiteward.

items.label: Spool Extender
items.description: Bought from Jubilana for 720 Rosaries

items.label: Reserve Bind
items.description: Reward for completing the Final Audience Wish.

items.label: Claw Mirror

items.label: Memory Crystal
items.description: Found in a hidden room in southwest Mount Fay.

items.label: Snitch Pick
items.description: Bought from Grindle for 740 Rosaries.

items.label: Volt Filament
items.description: Reward for defeating Voltvyrm in Voltnest.

items.label: Quick Sling
items.description: Found behind a breakable ceiling in Bilewater.

items.label: Wreath of Purity
items.description: Found in a secret passage within Putrified Ducts.

items.label: Longclaw
items.description: Reward for completing either the Broodfeast or Runtfeast Wishes

items.description: Reward for defeating Father of the Flame in Wisp Thicket.

items.label: Egg of Flealia
items.description: Reward from Fleamaster Mooshka after finding all 30 Fleas.

items.label: Pin Badge
items.description: Reward for defeating Pinstress.

items.description: Purchased from Jubilana for 320 rosaries after completing the The Lost Merchant Wish.

items.description: Purchased from Grindle for 350 rosaries.
